name: Game & Watch: Octopus
description:
I made this small little recreation of the Game & Watch Octopus model! You can play with either the arrow keys or clicking the buttons, and can mute audio by licking on the speaker icon. The goal of the game is to collect as much treasure at the treasure chest and then deposit them at the boat without getting caught!

You can also play Game B where the game is faster, but you earn double points!

Any feedback is appreciated!
